properties.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Eastern Chittenden; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Orleans; Southern Franklin
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 3:00PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations
of 5 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...The northwestern slopes of the Adirondacks and portions
of the northern Green Mountains.

* WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions
could impact the morning and evening commute on Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will arrive across the area Wednesday
evening and persist into Thursday before tapering off. Reduced
visibilities due to falling and blowing snow will compound
travel impacts.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
